```{r}
df <- read.table("https://bioboot.github.io/bggn213_W19/class-material/rs8067378_ENSG00000172057.6.txt",  header= TRUE, sep=" ")
head(df)
```
###Q13

```{r}
summary(df)
table(df$geno)

```
108 A/A, 233 A/G, and 121 G/G. 
```{r}
library(dplyr)

df %>%
  group_by(geno) %>%
  summarise(mean_exp = mean(exp))
```

###Q14

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(df, aes(x = geno, y = exp)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1, alpha = 0.5) +
  labs(x = "Genotype", y = "Expression", title = "Expression by genotype")
```
